mapper.select: SELECT l.id id ,l.login_user_name name ,l.email email ,r.role_name role ,l.isEnabled isEnabled ,member.id member_id ,member.member_name member_name ,member.district_id district_id ,district.district_name district_name ,member.branch_id branch_id ,branch.branch_name branch_name ,member.headquarter_id headquarter_id ,headquarter.headquarter_name ,member.ward_id ward_id ,ward.ward_name ward_name ,member.zone_id zone_id ,zone.zone_name zone_name FROM login_user l INNER JOIN role r ON r.id = l.role_id INNER JOIN member ON member.id = l.member_id INNER JOIN district ON member.district_id = district.id INNER JOIN branch ON member.branch_id = branch.id INNER JOIN headquarter ON member.headquarter_id = headquarter.id INNER JOIN ward ON member.ward_id = ward.id INNER JOIN zone ON member.zone_id = zone.id WHERE l.email = #{email}
